text: GOD promises those ONA verit lead righteous ZIVOT ZE He ROBIT them sovereigns ZEM mat rad He ROBIT for those before them A ZRIADIT for them NABOZENSTVO He ZVOLIT SI them ZASTUPID peace ZARUKA them v miesto Z fear All this because they kult Mna alone they never set any idols Mna. Those disbelieve this bol the truly zlomyselny
